attributes.action: STOP ALL FINANCIAL AID TO INDIA WHO JUST FLOUTED MILLIONS ON A SPACE MISSION.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SPENDING 81 MILLION ON A SPACE MISSION WHEN TRILLIONS ARE STARVING, HAVE NO SEWAGE FACILITIES, NO CLEAN WATER OR FOOD TO EAT IS A TOTAL DISGRACE. THE INDIAN ELITE HAVE PLENTY OF CASH AND IGNORE THE UNTOUCHABLES STILL. IT IS A CRYING SHAME FOR BRITAIN TO BE GIVING FINANCIAL AID INSTEAD OF HELPING ITS OWN POPULATION PULL OUT OF A RECESSION. THIS MONEY SHOULD BE SPENT ON AUGMENTING THE PENSIONS OF OLD AGE PEOPLE WHO NOW LIVE WITH WORRIES ABOUT HEATING THEIR HOMES AND HOW TO KEEP FROM STARVING THEMSELVES. CHARITY BEGINS AT HOME!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
